name: UCommonButtonBase
doc: Button that disables itself when not active. Also updates actions for CommonActionWidget if bound to display platform-specific icons.

MinWidth: The minimum width of the button (only used if greater than the style's minimum)
MinHeight: The minimum height of the button (only used if greater than the style's minimum)
bHideInputAction: Whether to hide the input action widget at all times (useful for textless small buttons)
PressedSlateSoundOverride:
Optional override for the sound to play when this button is pressed.
Also used for the Selected and Locked Pressed state if their respective overrides are empty.
HoveredSlateSoundOverride:
Optional override for the sound to play when this button is hovered.
Also used for the Selected and Locked Hovered state if their respective overrides are empty.
SelectedPressedSlateSoundOverride: Optional override for the sound to play when this button is pressed while Selected
SelectedHoveredSlateSoundOverride: Optional override for the sound to play when this button is hovered while Selected
LockedPressedSlateSoundOverride: Optional override for the sound to play when this button is pressed while Locked
LockedHoveredSlateSoundOverride: Optional override for the sound to play when this button is hovered while Locked
HoldData: Press and Hold values used for Keyboard and Mouse, Gamepad and Touch, depending on the current input type
bSimulateHoverOnTouchInput: True if this button should play the hover effect when pressed by a touch input
bIsPersistentBinding:
DANGER! Be very, very careful with this. Unless you absolutely know what you're doing, this is not the property you're looking for.

True to register the action bound to this button as a "persistent" binding. False (default) will register a standard activation-based binding.
A persistent binding ignores the standard ruleset for UI input routing - the binding will be live immediately upon construction of the button.
InputModeOverride: Set this to Game for special cases where an input action needs to be set for an in-game button.
InputActionWidget:
Optionally bound widget for visualization behavior of an input action;
NOTE: If specified, will visualize according to the following algorithm:
If TriggeringEnhancedInputAction is specified, visualize it else:
If TriggeringInputAction is specified, visualize it else:
If TriggeredInputAction is specified, visualize it else:
Visualize the default click action while hovered
bApplyAlphaOnDisable: The type of mouse action required by the user to trigger the button's 'Click'
bLocked:
True if this button is currently locked.
Locked button can be hovered, focused, and pressed, but the Click event will not go through.
Business logic behind it will not be executed. Designed for progressive disclosure
bSelectable: True if the button supports being in a "selected" state, which will update the style accordingly
bShouldSelectUponReceivingFocus: If true, the button will be selected when it receives focus.
bInteractableWhenSelected: If true, the button may be clicked while selected. Otherwise, interaction is disabled in the selected state.
bToggleable: True if the button can be deselected by clicking it when selected
bDisplayInputActionWhenNotInteractable: True if the input action should be displayed when the button is not interactable
bHideInputActionWithKeyboard: True if the input action should be hidden while the user is using a keyboard
bShouldUseFallbackDefaultInputAction: True if this button should use the default fallback input action (bool is useful for buttons that shouldn't because they are never directly hit via controller)
bRequiresHold: True if this button should have a press and hold behavior, triggering the click when the specified hold time is met
ClickMethod: The type of mouse action required by the user to trigger the button's 'Click'
TriggeringInputAction:
The input action that is bound to this button. The common input manager will trigger this button to
click if the action was pressed
TriggeringEnhancedInputAction:
The enhanced input action that is bound to this button. The common input manager will trigger this button to
click if the action was pressed

methods.name: DisableButtonWithReason
methods.doc: Disables this button with a reason (use instead of SetIsEnabled)

methods.name: GetCurrentButtonPadding
methods.doc: @return The current button padding that corresponds to the current size and selection state

methods.name: GetCurrentCustomPadding
methods.doc: @return The custom padding that corresponds to the current size and selection state

methods.name: GetCurrentTextStyle
methods.doc: @return The text style that corresponds to the current size and selection state

methods.name: GetCurrentTextStyleClass
methods.doc: @return The class of the text style that corresponds to the current size and selection state

methods.name: GetEnhancedInputAction
methods.doc: Gets the appropriate enhanced input action that is set

methods.name: GetInputAction
methods.doc: Gets the appropriate input action that is set

methods.name: GetIsFocusable
methods.doc: Gets the bIsFocusable flag

methods.name: GetLocked
methods.doc: @returns True if the button is currently locked, False otherwise

methods.name: GetSelected
methods.doc: @returns True if the button is currently in a selected state, False otherwise

methods.name: GetShouldSelectUponReceivingFocus
methods.doc: Get whether the button should become selected upon receiving focus or not

methods.name: GetSingleMaterialStyleMID
methods.doc: Returns the dynamic instance of the material being used for this button, if it is using a single material style.

methods.name: GetStyle
methods.doc: @Returns Current button style

methods.name: IsInteractionEnabled
methods.doc: Is this button currently interactable? (use instead of GetIsEnabled)

methods.name: IsPressed
methods.doc: Is this button currently pressed?

methods.name: OnActionComplete
methods.doc: Callback fired when hold events complete

methods.name: OnActionProgress
methods.doc: Callback fired continously during hold interactions

methods.name: OnCurrentTextStyleChanged
methods.doc: Allows derived classes to take action when the current text style has changed

methods.name: OnTriggeredInputActionChanged
methods.doc: Callback fired when input action datatable row changes

methods.name: OnTriggeringEnhancedInputActionChanged
methods.doc: Callback fired when enhanced input action changes

methods.name: OnTriggeringInputActionChanged
methods.doc: Callback fired when triggered input action datatable row changes

methods.name: SetClickMethod
methods.doc: Set the click method for mouse interaction

methods.name: SetIsFocusable
methods.doc: Updates the bIsFocusable flag

methods.name: SetIsInteractableWhenSelected
methods.doc: Change whether this widget is selectable at all. If false and currently selected, will deselect.

methods.name: SetIsInteractionEnabled
methods.doc: Change whether this widget is selectable at all. If false and currently selected, will deselect.

methods.name: SetIsLocked
methods.doc: Change whether this widget is locked. If locked, the button can be focusable and responsive to mouse input but will not broadcast OnClicked events.

methods.name: SetIsSelectable
methods.doc: Change whether this widget is selectable at all. If false and currently selected, will deselect.

methods.name: SetIsSelected
methods.doc:
Change the selected state manually.
@param bGiveClickFeedback    If true, the button may give user feedback as if it were clicked. IE: Play a click sound, trigger animations as if it were clicked.

methods.name: SetIsToggleable
methods.doc: Change whether this widget is toggleable. If toggleable, clicking when selected will deselect.

methods.name: SetMinDimensions
methods.doc: Sets the minimum dimensions of this button

methods.name: SetPressMethod
methods.doc: Set the click method for keyboard/gamepad button press interaction

methods.name: SetSelectedInternal
methods.doc: Internal method to allow the selected state to be set regardless of selectability or toggleability

methods.name: SetShouldSelectUponReceivingFocus
methods.doc: Set whether the button should become selected upon receiving focus or not; Only settable for buttons that are selectable

methods.name: SetShouldUseFallbackDefaultInputAction
methods.doc: Change whether this widget should use the fallback default input action.

methods.name: SetStyle
methods.doc: Sets the style of this button, rebuilds the internal styling

methods.name: SetTouchMethod
methods.doc: Set the click method for touch interaction

methods.name: SetTriggeredInputAction
methods.doc: Updates the current triggered action

methods.name: SetTriggeringEnhancedInputAction
methods.doc: Updates the current triggering enhanced input action, requires enhanced input enabled in CommonUI settings

methods.name: SetTriggeringInputAction
methods.doc: Updates the current triggering action

methods.name: StopDoubleClickPropagation
methods.doc: Unless this is called, we will assume the double click should be converted into a normal click.
